name: Kelksiomides
content:
Kelksiomides

The Green Warden

Source Distant Shores pg. 13
Pathfinder Wiki Kelksiomides

Details

Alignment NG
Pantheon Iblydan Hero-Gods
Areas of Concern Hero-god of gardens, orchards, and terraces
Domains Good, Plant
Subdomains N/A
* Requires the Acolyte of Apocrypha trait.
Favored Weapon Sickle
Symbol Image of a tree emerging from a home

On Golarion

Centers of Worship Aelyosos
Nationality Iblydan

Unique Spell Rules

Source Distant Shores pg. 13

Cleric/Warpriest

Plant Growth can be prepared as a 2nd-level spell [only for the spell's enrichment effect]
Goodberry can be prepared as a 1st-level spell

Oracle

Plant Growth can be prepared as a 2nd-level spell [only for the spell's enrichment effect]
Goodberry can be prepared as a 1st-level spell
